name: Global Entertainment Token
description: Global Entertainment Token (GET) is a Cardano-native digital asset designed to serve as the settlement and governance layer for a cross-sector entertainment platform. The project links music, film, sports, gaming and live events with tokenised real-world assets such as tickets, merchandise and property. Its infrastructure—comprising GET Wallet, GET Pay and an NFT/RWA marketplace—enables transparent revenue distribution to creators, verifiable ownership for fans and a single payment rail that works in both virtual and physical venues. By combining utility and governance in one currency, GET provides the foundation for a participatory, data-transparent entertainment economy.
